intro-heading: Setting the standard for international remittance service
intro-description: We are the fastest growing international remittance service provider with best rate in the market and no hidden fees.
blob-1-description: Simple remittance request with fast payment. Transfer money easily through your smartphone from anywhere
blob-2-description: Partnership with the world’s trusted banks and payment providers. Safe system licensed by financial authorities.
blob-3-description: Save up to 90% with lower fees and competitive exchange rate in the market.
blob-4-description: We will inform you in an easy-to-understand manner of the entire process of payment.
cta-description: Start sending money to your loved ones easily using QSRemit mobile App. Registration, verification and money transfer all under your fingertip.
feature-1-description: Start sending money from Japan easily by using our mobile application. With our online member registration service it is fast and simple to become our member.
feature-2-description: There's no need to come to our office or branch in person to become a member and send money to your loved ones. All necessary procedures for becoming our member is now simplified with our state of the art verification system.
feature-3-description: Once you have our mobile app installed and membership verified, it is as simple as tapping a button to check rates, send money and also track your current and previous remittance records in realtime.
title-send-money-app: How to send money using QSRemit app
title-register-app: How to register using QSRemit app
title-thanks: Thanks for sending money with us
cta-secondary-title: Looking for one of our branch?
tracker-pin-description: Enter your 15 digit long transaction pin number to track.
tracker-contact-support: Contact our support staff from below of you are having difficulty in using this transaction tracker.
tracker-not-found-description-1: We could not find transaction with pin code QP
tracker-not-found-description-2: Are you sure you entered the correct pin code.
tracker-: Your money have been paid successfully.
tracker-success: Your money have been paid successfully.
tracker-canceled-description-2: Please contact our support team for more details.
office-day-03: Our office will be closed on Saturday.
ceo-message-title: 고객의 신뢰에 건실하게 응답하는 해외송금 전문회사
ceo-message-description: 2017 년 11월에  2017-10호로 기획재정부에 정식으로 등록된 해외송금 전문 회사입니다. 고객의 신뢰와 응원에 힘입어 여기까지 성장하였습니다. 경험이 풍부한 임직원과 함께 고객 여러분의 만족과 안심을 얻을 수있는 해외 송금 서비스로 만들어 가겠습니다. 계속해서 고객 여러분의 응원을 부탁드립니다.
